item.title: Firstly clothes recycling bin over flowing AGAIN, 26th July
item.description:
Secondly - fly tipping ! This has got worse since you closed our local recycling centre ! Can the clothes recycling bin either be added to or emptied more regularly please ? CCTV for fly tipping ?????

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Athelstan Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thorny basal growth still needs removing, 26th July
item.description:
Thankyou for urgently dealing with the basal growth outside Jet Garage - st pauls cray - motorists who use this garage are very thankful of your prompt work ! Could you now please deal with the thorny basal growth opposite CO -OP in Cotmandene crescent ? Thankyou x

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 113, Cotmandene Crescent, St Paul's Cray, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish bag, 26th July
item.description:
Someone has dumped this outside my property. This is not a one off, we have a regular person that keeps dumping these bags of cans and takeaway/microwave meal boxes around this road. We then have the issue that the foxes rip them open and spread the mess

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kechill Gardens, Hayes, London
